remarks: A trichotomy relationship, given a trichotomous order.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 28-Sep-2019.)
statement:
sotritric.or $e |- R Or A $.
sotritric.tri $e |- ( ( B e. A /\ C e. A ) -> ( B R C \/ B = C \/ C R B ) ) $.
sotritric $p |- ( ( B e. A /\ C e. A ) -> ( B R C <-> -. ( B = C \/ C R B ) ) ) $.
